lead_paragraph: The judge overseeing Detroit's bankruptcy refused Monday to stop the city from shutting off water if people can't pay their bill, saying there's no right to water and the law doesn't give him the power to keep the taps open anyway.

headline.main: Judge Won't Stop Detroit Water Shutoffs
headline.print_headline: Judge Won't Stop Detroit Water Shutoffs

snippet: The judge overseeing Detroit's bankruptcy refused Monday to stop the city from shutting off water if people can't pay their bill, saying there's no right to water and the law doesn't give him the power to keep the taps open anyway....
